name: d3-org-chart
description: Highly customizable org chart, created with d3

scripts._prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-org-chart.js -c -m -o build/d3-org-chart.min.js
scripts._postpublish: zip -j build/d3-org-chart.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-org-chart.js build/d3-org-chart.min.js
scripts.pretest: rm -rf build && mkdir build && rollup -g d3-selection:d3,d3-array:d3,d3-hierarchy:d3,d3-zoom:d3,d3-flextree:d3,d3-shape:d3,d3-group:d3  -f umd -n d3 -o build/d3-org-chart.js -- index.js
scripts.prepublish: npm run test && uglifyjs build/d3-org-chart.js -c -m -o build/d3-org-chart.min.js
scripts.postpublish: zip -j build/d3-org-chart.zip -- LICENSE README.md build/d3-org-chart.js build/d3-org-chart.min.js
